arts.ttl: 50,000 tickets sold for Coppa Italia clash Milan vs Lecce
arts.sum: Autumn has begun. Temperatures are dropping and the weather is not ideal. But, according to the daily Turin-based newspaer, Tuttosport, this does not stop the AC Milan club supporters from wanting to go to the San Siro venue to watch their beloved team play. The Rossoneri team will face Coppa Italia action tomorrow. Marco Landucci […]

arts.ttl: GdS: Lecce game an ‘opportunity’ for the unseen – the changes Milan could make
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan are looking to do well in the Coppa Italia this season, but they will not go all out in the first few rounds of the competition. On the eve of the Round of 32, Massimiliano Allegri stated that the Coppa Italia was ‘one of the three objectives of the season’. Now, the equation […] The post GdS: Lecce game an ‘opportunity’ for the unseen – the changes Milan could make appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Milan prepare for Lecce in Coppa Italia | Nkunku set to start?
arts.sum: Not even enough time to enjoy the fine win away at Udinese, Milan must get straight back on the pitch, this time in the Coppa Italia. Tomorrow at 21:00 at San Siro the Rossoneri face Lecce in the round of 32. "The Coppa Italia is one of the three seasonal objectives," Massimiliano Allegri had said […]

arts.ttl: AC Milan vs Lecce - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Coppa Italia clash between AC Milan and Lecce, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
